all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Fear not thine enemies, for they are in mine hands and I will do my pleasure with them.
Doctrine and Covenants 136:30
Quote of the Day
"We have been encouraged to move to a higher and holier celebration of Easter."
Elder Gary E. Stevenson | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
